articles.author: Stephanie Dalzell
articles.title: COVID-19 Delta strain requires two vaccine doses for protection, Therapeutic Goods Administration boss says - ABC News
articles.description: The head of the Therapeutic Goods Administration says although a single dose of vaccine provides good protection against variants of COVID-19, the Delta strain now in Australia needs two shots.
articles.content:
Australians will need two doses of a COVID-19 vaccine to adequately protect themselves against the highly infectious Delta variant of the virus, health authorities have warned.
